headline: Axon Enterprise AI Pivot Tests Market Faith In Long Term Story
summary: Axon Enterprise (NasdaqGS:AXON) has acquired emergency call handling firm Carbyne, expanding its reach into AI-powered public safety software. The company has also introduced Axon 911, an AI-enabled emergency response platform aimed at improving call triage and coordination. Together, these moves signal a shift from a hardware centric model toward a broader AI driven public safety ecosystem. For investors watching NasdaqGS:AXON, these product and acquisition moves arrive after a period of...
